Titles.eng: Zoids: New Century Zero
Titles.jpn: ゾイド新世紀／ゼロ

Summaries.eng:
New Century Zero takes place a long time after the events of Zoids: Chaotic Century. Zoids are no longer used for warfare; instead the combative natures of both Zoids and humans are focused and contained by a series of battle-competitions and tournaments, run by the Zoid Battle Commission.

The Zoid Battle Commission seems to be a significant power on Planet Zi, fielding a considerable arsenal of armed Zoids, orbital platforms serviced by their own launch facilities as well as orbital based weapons systems. It is not made clear in the series if the Helic Republic and Guylos Empire still exist, although the final battle upon the rusted Ultrasaurus, hinted to be same one in Zoids: Chaotic Century, could suggest neither were left and people had free rein to battle in old battlefields.

The series focuses on the Blitz Team, in particular the actions of the Liger Zero and Bit Cloud. The series charts the rise of the Blitz Team through various competitions of the Zoid Battle Commission, and the team's efforts to avoid conflict with the criminal organization known as the Backdraft Group.
Summaries.jpn:
バン達の戦いが終わり平和が戻った惑星Ｚｉでは、ゾイドは戦争ではなく戦闘競技において活躍しつづけていた。
荒涼とした大地を舞台に様々なルール、ライバル達とのバトルへと主人公ビット・クラウドを中心としたチームブリッツの面々が挑む！

Aliases: ゾイド新世紀スラッシュゼロ

Titles.eng: Shogakukan English Pilot
Commence Battle: Attack Liger Zero
Titles.jpn: 戦闘開始! -ライガーゼロ ゴー・ファイト!-

Summaries.eng: Bit Cloud is out looking for Zoid parts when a battle begins around him. Can he convience either the Blitz Team or the Saber Fang squad to let him join their squad, or will he be stuck as a scavenger forever?

Titles.eng: New Partners vs Naomi; The Red Comet
Titles.jpn: 二人の勝利 -紅き閃光 ナオミ-

Summaries.eng: When Bit goes into a long range battle without a decent long range weapon, it's up to him and Liger to get up by "The Red Comet" in her type of fight. Can they make it close range when Naomi has never been in close range before?

Titles.eng: The Prince Arrives: Harry Champ
Titles.jpn: 王者登場 -ハリー・チャンプ-

Summaries.eng: A mysterious man ambushes the Blitz Team and tries to get Lena to share his love. The man is a rich man by the name Harry Champ, and he wants to marry Lena, but first he must defeat Bit. Can this millionaire succeed?

Titles.eng: Unsanctioned Battle: The Mysterious Backdraft Group
Titles.jpn: 闇バトル! -謎のバックドラフト団-

Summaries.eng: When the unknown Backdraft Group captures Lena and forces the Blitz team into an unsanctioned battle, it's up to Bit to save the day. Can Liger Zero claim another victory?

Titles.eng: High Speed Battle: Transforming Into Zero Jager
Titles.jpn: 高速対決! -ゼロイエーガー-

Summaries.eng: When the Champ Team hires Jack Cisco to defeat the Blitz Team, it's up to Bit to unlock the Liger's first transformation unit. Will they succeed, or will the Lightning Siax just have too much speed to be defeated?

Titles.eng: The Dark Giant: The Invincible Elephandor
Titles.jpn: 闇の巨象 -強敵エレファンダー-

Summaries.eng: The Back Draft Group decides to once again attack the Blitz Team with a new unknown zoid: The Elephandor, but what exactly is the Ultimate X zoid that the Back Draft group is looking for?

Titles.eng: The Desert Gang: The Hover Cargo's in Danger
Titles.jpn: 激走の荒野 -ホバーカーゴ危機百発!-

Summaries.eng: When the Blitz team and Fluggel teams get ambushed in the desert, it's up to Lenna and her new Gunsniper to save the day. Will they succeed?

Titles.eng: Invasion of the Fierce Tigers: Transform to Zero Schneider
Titles.jpn: 猛虎襲来! -換装!! ゼロシュナイダー-

Summaries.eng: An unknown man named Dr. Layon decides to help the Tigers team get on the winning track again, but at what costs, and why does he want to destroy Lenna's dad?

Titles.eng: The Princess Arrives: Mary Champ
Titles.jpn: 女帝登場 -マリー・チャンプ-

Summaries.eng: Harry's sister Mary decides to come and make him grow up until she sees the Liger Zero. Now she wants to win the Liger Zero for herself, but can she actually defeat the Blitz team when no one else has?

Titles.eng: Desert Tusk: Assault of the War Sharks
Titles.jpn: 砂漠の牙 -ウオディック強襲!!-

Summaries.eng: Altail decides to have the Back Draft group try one final test on Liger Zero to prove its the Ultimate X. Can Bit and Liger survive?

Titles.eng: The Sensational Three: Rematch with Jack Cisco
Titles.jpn: 三つの旋風 -再戦! ライトニングサイクス-

Summaries.eng: Jack Cisco forms a team composed of nothing but Lightning Siax to do battle with the Blitz Team. Can Bit and company have any hope of winning when they only have one fast Zoid?

Titles.eng: Zero Is Stolen: The Fiery Battle
Titles.jpn: ゼロ強奪! -ファイヤーデスバトル-

Summaries.eng: Liger Zero is stolen by Altail and the Back Draft group to do a one-on-one battle with the Elephandor. Can Bit and Liger survive when all their safeties have been removed?

Titles.eng: The Brave Wild Eagle: The Raynos vs. the Zabats
Titles.jpn: 荒鷲の勇者 -レイノスVSザバット-

Summaries.eng: The Zoid battle commission allows the Blitz Team to do battle with the Back Draft Group in an approved match-up, but will the Blitz Team stand a chance when Jamie is their only air pilot, and he can't even control the Raynos he now has?

Titles.eng: Fright Day The 13th
Titles.jpn: リノン絶叫 -13日のノコギリ魔-

Summaries.eng: Lenna gets challenged by the "Chainsaw" man in this classic Halloween spoof. Does she stand any chance against the mysterious Zoid that cuts everything up, or will her teammates even stand by her?

Titles.eng: Layon Returns: Anti-Gravity Catastrophe!
Titles.jpn: ラオン再び -反重力カタストロフィ-

Summaries.eng: Dr. Layon decides to get revenge on Dr. Toros by kidnapping Lenna and forcing the Blitz Team into a gravity free battle. Can Liger Zero and the Command Wolf defeat Layon when they can't get a firm grip on the ground?

Titles.eng: Red Rival: Leon Toros Returns!
Titles.jpn: 赤き好敵手（ライバル） -レオン・トロス帰還-

Summaries.eng: When the Back Draft group overwhelms Naomi, she gets help from an unlikely source. The two form a team together and challenge the Blitz Team. Can Bit and compnay have any chance against this new "unknown" rival?

Titles.eng: Warriors On Vacation: The Storm Sworders
Titles.jpn: 戦士の休息 -二つのストームソーダー-

Summaries.eng: Dr. Layon joins the Back draft group to strengthen his abilities to get revenge on Toros. Can he actually finally win an illegal battle against the Blitz Team?

Titles.eng: Love on the Battlefield: My Love, the Judge
Titles.jpn: 恋する戦場（バトルフィールド） -愛しのジャッジマンさま-

Summaries.eng: Benjamin has fallen in love with a judge that has the same operating frequency as him. And with Harry & Bit's help he might see her again.

Titles.eng: The Third Conversion: Zero Panzer's Debut!
Titles.jpn: 第三の換装 -ゼロパンツァー始動!!-

Summaries.eng: Stoller has left the Back Draft group and become a legintimate Zi fighter, but will he stand a chance when the Back Draft Group decides to retaliate? Perhaps, with a little help from Bit.

Titles.eng: The Shadow Fox: Brad's Betrayal
Titles.jpn: フォックス -裏切りのバラッド-

Summaries.eng: Brad goes looking for a mysterious new Zoid, but will his temptation to gain the Zoid cause him to leave and attack the Blitz Team?

Titles.eng: Harry's Disaster: Dr. Layon Traps Toros!
Titles.jpn: 王者（ハリー）の災難 -ラオン博士の華麗なる罠-

Summaries.eng: When Lenna finally accepts a date from Harry, Dr. Layon decides they must be lovers and kidnaps Harry. Will Lenna be able to go at full strength during the next battle knowing that Layon has Harry?

Titles.eng: The Dragon Under the Sea: In Search of the Ultimate X
Titles.jpn: 海に潜む竜 -アルティメットXを探せ!-

Summaries.eng: The Back Draft group decides to search for another Ultimate X. Can Bit and Harry stop them from succeding?

Titles.eng: The Dragon Awakens: The Berserk Fury Enters the Fray
Titles.jpn: 目覚める竜 -バーサークフューラー参戦-

Summaries.eng: On a day of recreation, Blitz and Jack are humiliated by a kid named Vega. The next day, they are attacked by a new Zoid piloted by the same kid. Why is he attacking them?

Titles.eng: Tournament of Heroes: The Royal Cup
Titles.jpn: 勇者の祭典 -開幕! ロイヤルカップ-

Summaries.eng: All Class A teams are put into the Royal Cup competition. The winner gets admitted into Class S, but the only Zoids that can be used are what you carry on hand. There can be no repairs once a Zoid is defeated. Can the Blitz Team find a way to win with only 4 Zoids, 3 transformations, and at least 5 battle wins needed?

Titles.eng: Survival: The Mystery of the Ultimate X
Titles.jpn: サバイバル -アルティメットXの謎-

Summaries.eng: It all comes down to this. The Blitz team wins all 5 of their matches to advance to the final, but Team Vega also gets 5 wins. Which one will end up being the Ultimate champion?

Titles.eng: The Miracle of Zero - The Wind, the Clouds, and Adventure
Titles.jpn: ゼロの軌跡 -風と雲と冒険と…-

Summaries.eng: Everyone except for the Blitz Team and the Vega team have suffered losses, so it comesdown to the two of them. Which Ultimate X will end up being the victor?
